introduction.title: The Neon City
introduction.text: You are a cyborg in a city of chrome and neon. You are haunted by dreams of a life you never had. You must discover the truth about your past.

search_for_origins.title: A Dark Past
search_for_origins.text: You discover that you were once a human who was forced to become a cyborg. The people who did this to you are still out there, and they will stop at nothing to keep their secrets.

embrace_new_life.title: A New Beginning
embrace_new_life.text: You accept your new life as a cyborg. You are no longer haunted by the past, and you are free to forge your own future.

confront_creators.title: A Final Showdown
confront_creators.text: You confront your creators, and you learn the truth. You are a weapon, and they are your masters. You have a choice to make: obey them or fight for your freedom.
